solution_line_template: He has {total_fish_pounds} pounds of fish because {num_tuna} x {weight_per_tuna} = <<{num_tuna}*{weight_per_tuna}={total_fish_pounds}>>{total_fish_pounds}
He has enough for {customers_served} customers because {total_fish_pounds} / {pounds_per_customer} = <<{total_fish_pounds}/{pounds_per_customer}={customers_served}>>{customers_served}
{customers_without_fish} customers go home without any fish because {total_customers} - {customers_served} = <<{total_customers}-{customers_served}={customers_without_fish}>>{customers_without_fish}
